Summary
mutation: methods to access mutation data

head1 SYNOPSIS

Methods to load and store mutation data
Uses Bioperl (install bioperl-live)
Package variables top
No package variables defined.
Synopsistop
No synopsis!

No description!

store_mutantNo descriptionCode

Methods description

Methods code

store_mutantdescriptiontopprevnext
sub store_mutant {
my ($self,$rsid,$name,$mseq,$ref,$method,$comment)=@_;
my @mseq=split(//,$mseq);
my @rsid=$self->get_data_by_primary_key($rsid);
my ($rseq,$cid)=@rsid[1,2];
die "Mutated sequence not same length" unless (length($rseq)==lenght($mseq));
my @rseq=split(//,$rseq);
my $refid=$self->table_insert('ref',$ref);
my $methid=$self->table_insert('method',$method);
my $mutid=$self->table_insert('mutation_set',$rsid,$name,$cid,$methid,$refid,$mseq,$comment);
for my $i (0..$##rseq) {
	unless ($rseq[$i] eq $mseq[$i]) {
		$self->table_insert('mutation',$mutid,$i,$mseq[$i]);
	}
}
